title: Remove extra top empty space above Progress bowl canvas

requirements.text: Update ONLY the selected element (the Progress bowl <canvas> rendered by `frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx`) to remove the apparent top empty space above the bowl by adjusting the canvas rendering/layout so the bowl is vertically positioned without extra top margin/blank area inside the canvas.

quotes: Remove top margin entirely from this container or parent container, basically the bowl container is too big there is empty space that is left at the top side of container

acceptanceCriteria: On the Progress page, the bowl visualization no longer has noticeable unused/blank space above it inside its container; the bowl is visually shifted up to eliminate the top gap.

The change is implemented by modifying the bowl canvas element behavior (CSS on the canvas and/or the bowl drawingâ€™s vertical origin in `ProgressBowl.tsx`), without changing unrelated page layout or other components.
The bowl remains fully visible (not clipped) and the animation continues to run correctly in both light and dark themes.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element (the bowl visualization canvas) and its direct canvas-rendering behavior; do not modify other page sections or unrelated containers.
Do not change any backend code or data models.
nonGoals: Redesigning the Progress page layout or changing the bowl container sizing/padding outside of the selected canvas element behavior
Any changes to progress calculations, ranks, or statistics
